title: Improved logging
description:
Enables the extended logging capabilities.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

level.title: Log Level
level.description:
Define the severity you would like to see in the logs. Avoid levels above INFO in production.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description:
Adds the defined string at the beginning of every logged line, so you can quickly filter messages with external tools later on.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

syslog.title: Logs to syslog
syslog.description:
Set to true to send logs to syslog.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

syslog_facility.title: Syslog facility
syslog_facility.description:
Local facility to send the messages.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

stdout.title: Logs to stdout
stdout.description:
Set to true to send logs to stdout.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

format.title: Log format
format.description:
Specify the format of the logs: default, logstash, or custom.
The custom format needs an additional key "custom_format".
The "logstash" format needs the "telemetry/logstash" component added too.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/

custom_format.title: Custom format
custom_format.description:
When the format is set to "custom", set the pattern describing the new format.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/
